topic: t3 and t4g Neptune Instance Types Information

  entities:
  
    t3|Product
    t4g|Product
    t3 family|Product
    t4g family|Product
    t3 instances|Product
    t4g instances|Product
    Neptune|Service
    Neptune free-tier offer|Service
    t3.medium|Product
    t4g.medium|Product
    Amazon Web Services|Service
    AWS Organization with Consolidated Billing|Service
    Payer Account|Service
  
  proposition: t3 is an instance type family.  
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    
    entity-attributes:
    t3|IS_TYPE|instance type family
      
  proposition: t4g is an instance type family.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    t4g|IS_TYPE|instance type family
    
  proposition: The t3 family of instances offers a low-cost option for getting started using a graph database.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    t3 family|OFFERS|low-cost option for getting started using a graph database
    
  proposition: The t4g family of instances offers a low-cost option for getting started using a graph database.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    t4g family|OFFERS|low-cost option for getting started using a graph database
    
  proposition: The t3 family of instances offers a low-cost option for initial development and testing.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    t3 family|OFFERS|low-cost option for initial development and testing
    
  proposition: The t4g family of instances offers a low-cost option for initial development and testing.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    t4g family|OFFERS|low-cost option for initial development and testing
    
  proposition: The t3 instances are eligible for the Neptune free-tier offer.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
    t3 instances|ELIGIBLE_FOR|Neptune free-tier offer
  
    entity-attributes:
    
  proposition: The t4g instances are eligible for the Neptune free-tier offer.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
    t4g instances|ELIGIBLE_FOR|Neptune free-tier offer
  
    entity-attributes:
    
  proposition: The Neptune free-tier offer lets new customers use Neptune at no cost for the first 750 instance hours used within a standalone AWS account or rolled up underneath an AWS Organization with Consolidated Billing (Payer Account).
  
    entity-entity relationships:
    Neptune free-tier offer|PROVIDES_ACCESS_TO|Neptune
    Neptune free-tier offer|WORKS_WITH|Amazon Web Services
    Neptune free-tier offer|WORKS_WITH|AWS Organization with Consolidated Billing
    Neptune free-tier offer|WORKS_WITH|Payer Account
  
    entity-attributes:
    Neptune free-tier offer|HAS_COST|no cost
    Neptune free-tier offer|HAS_DURATION|first 750 instance hours
    
  proposition: The t3 instances are only offered in the medium size configuration.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    t3 instances|OFFERED_IN|medium size configuration
    
  proposition: The t4g instances are only offered in the medium size configuration.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    t4g instances|OFFERED_IN|medium size configuration
    
  proposition: t3.medium is a medium size configuration of t3 instances.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
    t3.medium|CONFIGURATION_OF|t3 instances
  
    entity-attributes:
    t3.medium|HAS_SIZE|medium
    
  proposition: t4g.medium is a medium size configuration of t4g instances.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
    t4g.medium|CONFIGURATION_OF|t4g instances
  
    entity-attributes:
    t4g.medium|HAS_SIZE|medium
    
  proposition: The t3 instances are not intended for use in a production environment.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    t3 instances|INTENDED_FOR|not production environment
    
  proposition: The t4g instances are not intended for use in a production environment.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    t4g instances|INTENDED_FOR|not production environment
    
  proposition: The t3 instances have very constrained resources.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    t3 instances|HAS_RESOURCES|very constrained
    
  proposition: The t4g instances have very constrained resources.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    t4g instances|HAS_RESOURCES|very constrained
    
  proposition: The t3 instances are not recommended for testing query execution time because these instances have very constrained resources.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    t3 instances|RECOMMENDED_FOR|not testing query execution time
    
  proposition: The t4g instances are not recommended for testing query execution time because these instances have very constrained resources.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    t4g instances|RECOMMENDED_FOR|not testing query execution time
    
  proposition: The t3 instances are not recommended for testing overall database performance because these instances have very constrained resources.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    t3 instances|RECOMMENDED_FOR|not testing overall database performance
    
  proposition: The t4g instances are not recommended for testing overall database performance because these instances have very constrained resources.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    t4g instances|RECOMMENDED_FOR|not testing overall database performance
    
  proposition: To assess query performance, upgrade to one of the other instance families.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
